## Properties

| Property         | Attribute         | Description                                                                 | Type      | Default |
| ---------------- | ----------------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ------- |
| `hideUnselected` | `hide-unselected` | Whether to hide the text of internal unselected anchors unless hovering it. | `boolean` | `false` |
